ygData.subject: Re: [ANN] Heritrix 1.12.0
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi St.Ack (and Karl), thanks alot for the quick fix. The issue seems to be solved for me, the number of open files now stays stable. There is yet another issue

Hi St.Ack (and Karl),

thanks alot for the quick fix. The issue seems to be=
 solved for me,
the number of open files now stays stable. 

There is yet a=
nother issue that currently bites me which is closly
related to this issue.=
 I have reported the issue as [HER-1107] over at
JIRA.

Regards
  Olaf Frey=
er
